long_description: The lightweight and technical Mountain Hardwear Fluid 12 Pack is ideal for endurance athletes or weekend warriors who want to carry hydration and gear without getting slowed down. Soft, ventilated shoulder straps; stowable webbing belt adds stability when needed. Close-fitting suspension with on-the-fly compression and venting channels to prevent overheating. Easy-access hydration sleeve offers choice of routing tube over the shoulder or from the lower pack, left or right (reservoir sold separately). Top fleece-lined zippered pocket for safe storage of sunglasses, smart phone or other valuables; zippered front pocket with key clip. The Mountain Hardwear Fluid 12 Pack features stowable ice-axe loops and high-visibility reflective hits.
short_description: The lightweight and technical Mountain Hardwear Fluid 12 Pack is ideal for endurance athletes or weekend warriors who want to carry hydration and gear without getting slowed down.
